snippet: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., in an appearance on “CBS This Morning,” weighed in on reports that the New England Patriots deflated balls in the A.F.C. championship game. Mr. Biden added that he was a wide receiver, and that he “wasn’t...
abstract: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., in an appearance on “CBS This Morning,” weighed in on reports that the New England Patriots deflated balls in the A.F.C. championship game. Mr. Biden added that he was a wide receiver, and that he “wasn’t bad at it.”

headline.main: Verbatim: Biden on the Patriots Scandal
